kindred.client.model

Class Terrain

  • Object
    • kindred.client.model.Terrain

  • public class Terrain
extends Object
    Gives details about the vegetation of a Tile and how it affects a Unit's attributes.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int agilityModifier
      Percentage of agility increase/decrease to a Unit standing on a Tile with this Terrain.
      int defenseModifier
      Percentage of defense increase/decrease to a Unit standing on a Tile with this Terrain.
      int movePenalty
      Movement penalty inflicted on a Unit standing on a Tile with this terrain.
      String name
      Name given to Terrain.

      Constructs a Terrain.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        public final String name
        Name given to Terrain.

      • defenseModifier

        public final int defenseModifier
        Percentage of defense increase/decrease to a Unit standing on a Tile with this Terrain. For example, 30 gives +30% defense to the Unit.

      • agilityModifier

        public final int agilityModifier
        Percentage of agility increase/decrease to a Unit standing on a Tile with this Terrain. For example, -20 gives -20% agility to the Unit.

      • movePenalty

        public final int movePenalty
        Movement penalty inflicted on a Unit standing on a Tile with this terrain. For example, -1 means that the Unit will move 1 Tile less.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(String name,
               int defenseModifier,
               int agilityModifier,
               int movePenalty)
        Constructs a Terrain.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Terrain
        defenseModifier - percentage of defense increase/decrease to a Unit standing on a Tile with this Terrain
        agilityModifier - percentage of agility increase/decrease to a Unit standing on a Tile with this Terrain
        movePenalty - movement penalty inflicted on a Unit standing on a Tile with this Terrain
